org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup

类 TestHFileArchiving

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup.TestHFileArchiving

  • public class TestHFileArchiving
extends Object
    Test that the HFileArchiver correctly removes all the parts of a region when cleaning up a region
